verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) The Lord<WH3068> is my shepherd,<WH7462> I shall not want.<WH2637>
He makes me lie<WH7257> down<WH7257> in green<WH1877> pastures;<WH9318> He leads<WH5095> me beside<WH5921> quiet<WH4496> waters.<WH4325>
He restores<WH7725> my soul;<WH5315> He guides<WH5148> me in the paths<WH4570> of righteousness<WH6664> For His name's sake.<WH4616>

Even<WH1571> though<WH3588> I walk<WH1980> through the valley<WH1516> of the shadow<WH6757> of death,<WH6757> I fear<WH3372> no<WH3808> evil;<WH9563> for Thou art with me; Thy rod<WH7626> and Thy staff,<WH4938> they comfort<WH5162> me.

Thou dost prepare<WH6186> a table<WH7979> before<WH6440> me in the presence<WH5048> of my enemies;<WH6887> Thou hast anointed<WH1878> my head<WH7218> with oil;<WH8081> My cup<WH3563> overflows.<WH7310>

Surely<WH389> goodness<WH9185> and lovingkindness<WH2617> will follow<WH7291> me all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of my life,<WH9132> And I will dwell<WH3427> in the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068> forever.<WH753> <WH3117>
